text: ve allaah kee shapath lete hain ki unhonne ye[1] baat nahin kahee. jabaki vaastav mein, unhonne kufr kee baat kahee[2] hai aur islaam le aane ke pashchaat kaafir ho gaye hain aur unhonne aisee baat ka nishchay kiya tha, jo ve kar nahin sake aur unhen yahee baat buree lagee ki allaah aur usake rasool ne unhen apane anugrah se dhanee[3] kar diya. ab yadi ve kshama yaachana kar len, to unake lie uttam hai aur yadi vimuhkh hon, to allaah unhen duhkhadaayee yaatana lok tatha pralok mein dega aur unaka dharatee mein koee sanrakshak aur sahaayak na hoga
